LanguageData.MSHydrochloricAcid.label: Hydrochloric Acid
LanguageData.MSHydrochloricAcid.description: Hydrochloric acid (or muriatic acid) is a colorless inorganic chemical with the formula H2O:HCl. Hydrochloric acid has a distinctive pungent smell. It is classified as strongly acidic and can attack the skin, since the hydrogen chloride completely dissociates in aqueous solution. Hydrochloric acid is the simplest chlorine-based acid system containing water.
